testcase.failure:

testcase.classname: Acceptance testing to validate the successful submission message
testcase.name: Validate if the Submission message is displayed as expected
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the HomePage as "https://jupiter.cloud.planittesting.com/#/"..passed And I click on the Contact page.............................................passed Then on the subsequent page I populate the mandatory fields.................passed And I click on the submit button............................................passed And so I will validate the submission message...............................passed

testcase.classname: Acceptance testing to validate the errors on populating the mandatory fields with the invalid data
testcase.name: Validate if the Errors are displayed on giving invalid test data
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged on the HomePage as "https://jupiter.cloud.planittesting.com/#/".passed And I click on the Contact page menu in the HomePage........................passed Then on the subsequent page I populate the mandatory fields with invalid data.passed And so I will validate the errors displayed.................................passed

testcase.classname: Acceptance testing to verify the items in the Cart after shopping for the same
testcase.name: Verify if all the selected items are present in the cart after choosing them from the Shop page
testcase.system-out: Given I am able to open the home page "https://jupiter.cloud.planittesting.com/#/".passed And I click on the Shop page menu in the HomePage...........................passed Then on the following page I click for two times on Funny Cow...............passed And I click on the Fluffy Bunny for one time................................passed Then I click on the cart menu...............................................passed And so I verify if the items are present on the cart........................passed
